explains: n. （尤指不良事物、活动的）温床

sentences.en: The area was a hotbed of crime.
sentences.cn: 这个地区是犯罪活动的温床。

sentences.en: These are the seedlings that are hardening off in a hotbed.
sentences.cn: 这些是放在温床中经受耐寒锻炼的幼苗。

sentences.en: It is a rare year, however, when the hotbed of Texas seems relatively calm.
sentences.cn: 德克·萨斯向来是反堕胎活动的温床，然而今年相对显得风平浪静，这种情形可不多见。
